dict.string: Airova requires your consent to obtain location information when using it in order to upload photos or update avatars. If prohibited, you will not be able to publish works/update avatars.
dict.key: Privacy - Location Always and When In Use Usage Description
dict.string: Airova requires your consent to obtain location information when using it in order to upload photos or update avatars. If prohibited, you will not be able to publish works/update avatars.
dict.key: Privacy - Location When In Use Usage Description
dict.string: Airova requires your consent to obtain location information when using it in order to upload photos or update avatars. If prohibited, you will not be able to publish works/update avatars.
Airova needs your permission to access the microphone. If blocked, you will not be able to send audio messages to users.
dict.key: Privacy - Photo Library Additions Usage Description
dict.string: Airova needs your consent to access the album in order to save the work. If it is prohibited, you will not be able to save your work to the album.

Airova needs your consent to access the album to select photos to upload/publish works/update avatars. If prohibited, you will not be able to upload selected photos to upload/publish works/update avatars.
